hops.message: FastAPI route handler implementation found at GET /v1/admin/stats/opportunities
Admin router properly included in FastAPI application
Required models (User, Opportunity, Organisation) are imported and available
Admin console component exists but uses mock data only

defects.message: Frontend uses hardcoded mock data instead of calling the actual API endpoint
No admin API functions defined - missing integration layer between frontend and backend admin endpoints
No unit tests found for admin_get_opportunity_statistics endpoint
Function lacks proper response model definition - returns raw dict instead of typed response
Docstring could be more detailed about return data structure and query parameters
